sentence.Network_en: He is an extremely astute political tactician.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个极其精明的政治谋略家。

sentence.Network_en: She is a good enough tactician to wait and see what the election brings.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是个很有谋略的战术家，懂得静观选举的结果。

sentence.Network_en: This was why an airport manager needed to be a tactician as well as versatile administrator.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此,一个空港经理必须既是一个计谋家,又是一个能应付各种情况的行政管理家.

˙战术兵（Tactician）主要标志能力：丢出彩色烟雾弹当作重生点；次要标志能力：请求空中无人攻击机支援。 ˙破坏兵（Saboteur） …

list.abs: the tactician reprimanded for his behaviour during the 3-1 win over Empoli in Week 29 , but had insisted his complaints and bad language were not directed at the referee .这名教练因为在第29轮3比1击败恩波利的比赛中自己的行为而被指控，但是他坚持自己的抱怨以及不当的言论不是针对裁判的。
" Personally , I have great trust in the tactician andwork that the entire club is doing , " said Berlusconi .“就个人而言，我非常相信这位教练，整个俱乐部都正这么做，”贝卢斯科尼说。
Bianconeri tactician Didier Deschamps is also a massive fan of El Conejo , whom he bossed at Monaco two seasons ago .斑马主帅德尚同样渴求兔子的到来，二个赛季前萨维奥拉在摩纳哥踢球时正是德尚摩下一员大将。
I say she was a tactician not a strategist .我说她是一位战术不是一个战略家。
the Portuguese tactician has never been out of the spotlight at Stamford Bridge since arriving at the club in the summer of 2004 .这个葡萄牙战术家自从2004年夏天来到这个俱乐部就从来没有过的聚光灯。
" I'm pleased , " stated the Portuguese tactician . " It was a very good training session .“我很高兴，”葡萄牙战术大师说，“这是一场很好的热身赛。”

entry.def: If you say that someone is a good tactician, you mean that they are skilful at choosing the best methods in order to achieve what they want.

example.ex: He is an extremely astute political tactician...
example.tran: 他是个极其精明的政治谋略家。

example.ex: She is a good enough tactician to wait and see what the election brings.
example.tran: 她是个很有谋略的战术家，懂得静观选举的结果。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who is skilled at planning tactics

auth_sentence.content: A clever tactician at office politics.
